metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34038 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** Etcd v3.5.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via function PageWriter.write in pagewriter.go. NOTE: the vendor's position is that this is not a vulnerability.

criterions.comment: etcd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
